review.title: “Excellent Company to work for!”
review.pros: Pros – Very flexible with vacation and sick days!Very generous with bonus perks for employees (i.e. gift cards, parties, etc.)Great bosses!Great work environment and plenty of work!
review.cons: Cons – There really were not any cons! I became very spoiled working for them, so my next job isn't going to compare!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep doing what your doing! You have established a great "culture" and it was a pleasure working for you!
